iServerProperties.Description: To use methods from quality management in order to learn from past successes and failures. The CSI process implements a closed-loop feedback system as specified in ISO 20000 as a means to continually improve the effectiveness and efficiency of IT services and processes.

Attribute.Name: Category (General)
Attribute.Description: User-definable categorization taxonomy for each metamodel object.

Attribute.Name: ID
Attribute.Description: Unique identifier for the architecture object.

Attribute.Name: Last standard review date
Attribute.Description: Last date that the standard was reviewed.

Attribute.Name: Manual or automated
Attribute.Description: Whether this process is supported by IT or is a manual process.

Attribute.Name: Next standard review date
Attribute.Description: Next date for the standard to be reviewed.

Attribute.Name: Process criticality
Attribute.Description: Criticality of this process to business operations.

Attribute.Name: Process volumetrics
Attribute.Description: Data on frequency of process execution.

Attribute.Name: Retire date
Attribute.Description: Date when the standard was/will be retired.

Attribute.Name: Source
Attribute.Description: Location from where the information was collected.

Attribute.Name: Standard creation date
Attribute.Description: If the product is a standard, when the standard was created.

Attribute.Name: Standards class
Attribute.Description: Non-Standard, Proposed Standard, Provisional Standard, Standard, Phasing-Out Standard, Retired Standard.
